WSZA21 FAOR 272201
FACA SIGMET B01 VALID 272200/280200 FAOR-
FACA CAPE TOWN FIR SEV TURB FCST WI
S3421 E02520 - S3517 E02930 - S3522 E02937 - S3700 E02800 -
S3700 E02613 - S3455 E02341 FL300/340==

WVPR31 SPJC 271751
SPIM SIGMET 5 VALID 271810/280010 SPJC-
SPIM LIMA FIR VA ERUPTION MT SABANCAYA PSN S1547 W07150
VA CLD OBS AT 1720Z WI S1549 W07150 - S1607 W07149
- S1632 W07155 - S1622 W07210 - S1605 W07155 -
S1549 W07150 SFC/FL220
FCST AT 2330Z VA CLD WI S1522 W07146
- S1559 W07129 - S1622 W07129 - S1619 W07149 -
S1556 W07143 - S1540 W07143 - S1549 W07153 -
S1522 W07146 SFC/FL220==

WSUS32 KKCI 272255 
SIGC  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 48C 
VALID UNTIL 0055Z 
SD 
FROM 50NNW DPR-50W DPR-50NNW RAP 
LINE TS 20 NM WIDE MOV FROM 26025KT. TOPS TO FL270. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 280055-280455 
AREA 1...FROM 30SSE COU-30NE LIT-TXK-ACT-50S DLF-50SSE 
MRF-LBB-50WSW TUL-60W BUM-30SSE COU 
REF WW 149. 
WST ISSUANCES EXPD. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM 40WNW DIK-BIS-ANW-BFF-CZI-40WNW DIK 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
